"Very nice people, easy to work with, good quality materials and workmanship." "Fair price, quality products, on time and proper installation." "They are super friendly and the screens are economical and worth the price."

Had my motorized sun shade installed by Longhorn in Feb 2025. It is now Sep 2025. I’m very pleased with the overall outcome and results! It has totally transformed my patio space and reduced the heat in my house by quite a bit. I opted for … More Response from the owner 2 months ago

Hi Jonathan! Thank you for your wonderful feedback! We're so glad to hear that you're pleased with your new patio screen!  It's great to know that our team did an excellent job with the installation. We hope you enjoy your new patio space!

Longhorn Shades is our go to business for all things shades and screens! We're so glad to hear that you're pleased with your experience and that Barry, Carlos, and Trey made the process smooth for you. We appreciate your support!

What a great experience with Longhorn - our windows and house look great! We worked with Phillis, and she is fabulous. She is a great designer, able to help us define and create an entire look for our kitchen and family room windows.  She … More Response from the owner 2 months ago Thank you, Nancy! We're so glad to hear that you had a great experience and that you love the beautiful new look of your home, thanks to Phillis's design expertise. Your satisfaction means a lot to us!
